alert.note: Alert for Canyon Ferry Area; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 24 at 12:05PM MDT until October 25 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 10 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
